releases.title: IntelliFlow CRM Launches AI-Powered Lead Scoring Engine
releases.summary: New machine learning capabilities enable sales teams to prioritize leads with 95% accuracy, reducing time-to-conversion by 40%.

releases.title: IntelliFlow CRM Achieves ISO 27001 Certification
releases.summary: Enterprise-grade security validation demonstrates commitment to protecting customer data with governance-grade controls.

releases.title: IntelliFlow CRM Announces Partnership with Major ERP Providers
releases.summary: New integrations with SAP and Oracle enable seamless data flow between CRM and enterprise resource planning systems.

releases.title: IntelliFlow CRM Emerges from Stealth with $5M Seed Funding
releases.summary: AI-first CRM platform launches with backing from leading venture capital firms, targeting modern sales teams seeking automation with governance.

mediaKit.description: Download our media kit for brand assets, executive bios, product screenshots, and company fact sheet.
